info.title: Marcos Lopez: Part II
info.author: M. Z. (Wii port : beredezebe)
info.details:
MARCOS LOPEZ 2, The Real Life Simulator
http://code.google.com/p/bennugames/

- 1. DESCRIPTION -

Marcos Lopez 2 is a game of instant gratification, made
for people who don't like playing video games anymore.

A lot of people complained that Marcos Lopez 1 was too
short because of its 3 stages, so I made Marcos Lopez longer.
There are now in total 4 stages. Also, if you manage to
beat the game, there's a satisfying ending now.

Are you human enough to be Marcos Lopez?


- 2. GAME STORY -

You are a poet and a eternal dreamer. All you want to do
in your life is to sail the seas and to marry a beautiful girl,
but are you willing to pay the high price of having a girl who is not ugly?


- 3. CONTROLS -

In the game, you hold the Wiimote horizontal pad.

Left : move to the left
Right : move to the right
